title: permit `crate` as a shorthand visibility identifier

labels.name: T-lang
labels.description: Relevant to the language team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: C-tracking-issue
labels.description: Category: A tracking issue for an RFC or an unstable feature.

body:
As part of https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/44660, we plan to support `crate` as a visibility modifier equivalent to `pub(crate)`. Given that `pub(crate)` exists, this should be relatively straight-forward. 

Visibilities are stored in [the AST type `Visibility`](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/e3fb84e951e3c602d2dbbfebbd4ee275ac414893/src/libsyntax/ast.rs#L1793). We will want to extend the `Crate` variant to include one additional field, indicating whether the sugar `crate` or the expanded form `pub(crate)` was used. We can add an enum like 

```rust
enum CrateSugar {
    /// User wrote `pub(crate)`
    PubCrate,

    /// User wrote `crate`
    JustCrate,
}
```

and add this field to [the `Crate` variant](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/e3fb84e951e3c602d2dbbfebbd4ee275ac414893/src/libsyntax/ast.rs#L1793), so that it looks like `Crate(Span, CrateSugar)`. Actually, at the same time we can remove the `Span` field, which appears to be unused, so it would just become `Crate(CrateSugar)`. Doing this simultaneously is sorta bad but will save you some editing, since all existing uses look like `Crate(_)`, and 99% of them want to ignore the `CrateSugar` field anyway. =)

The one user that does NOT want to ignore `CrateSugar` is the pretty printer.  We just want to change [this line](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/e3fb84e951e3c602d2dbbfebbd4ee275ac414893/src/libsyntax/print/pprust.rs#L1443) to something like:

```rust
 ast::Visibility::Crate(CrateSugar::PubCrate) => self.word_nbsp("pub(crate)"),
 ast::Visibility::Crate(CrateSugar::JustCrate) => self.word_nbsp("crate"),
```

Naturally, we also will want to alter the parser itself, in particular [the `parse_visibility` function](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/e3fb84e951e3c602d2dbbfebbd4ee275ac414893/src/libsyntax/parse/parser.rs#L5325). Currently, if it doesn't see the word `pub`, [it just returns](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/e3fb84e951e3c602d2dbbfebbd4ee275ac414893/src/libsyntax/parse/parser.rs#L5328). We need to extend this to look for `crate` and -- if it finds it -- to return the new visibility (with sugar `JustCrate`). We also need to modify [the existing `pub(crate)` code](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/e3fb84e951e3c602d2dbbfebbd4ee275ac414893/src/libsyntax/parse/parser.rs#L5341) to return `PubCrate` for the sugar.

(Note: Please limit discussion on this issue strictly to implementation concerns relative to this particular change. Policy discussion as to whether or not to make this change -- or whether to make other changes to the module system -- belong in https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/44660.)
